attributes.action: Ex Pats should not be allowed to vote in the upcoming EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details: With Ex Pats creating a future court case, the government is urged to not allow a vote from those living outside the UK for over 15 years. Such votes are likely to be biased and not a true reflection on those who reside in the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: Ex pats that have lived outside the UK for over 15 years should not be given a vote in the upcoming referendum. They have decided to live outside the UK and should not have a say in this important vote that affects those that live in the United Kingdom.
